text:

Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)

Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)

Sienna Miller has us all wondering what fighter pilots’ thumbs look like.

“I do miss my breasts being where they were,” the actress said of her post-baby body in the new issue of Allure. “I have nipples like fighter pilots’ thumbs. But I also sort of like that they’re a little ’70s. And that they fed my kid.”

The 35-year-old “Lost City of Z” star also opened up about co-parenting with her ex, Tom Sturridge.

“We do bedtime every day,” she said, “We felt like as much togetherness as possible would be ideal, and fortunately we really love each other and are best friends, and so that works.

She added, “It’s not that it’s not complicated because it is.”

Sturridge and Miller got engaged in 2012, the same year they welcomed their daughter, Marlowe. The couple called off their engagement in 2015.

Miller recently shut down rumors of flirting with newly single Brad Pitt, telling Page Six, it’s “silly.”
title: Sienna Miller thinks her nipples look like ‘fighter pilot thumbs’
